Their presence flickers like a dying flame, vanishing into the shadows before striking with lethal precision. Few truly understand the Shadowkin, and even fewer trust them.
title: 🌑 Shadowkin (Masters of Stealth)
description: A secretive and elusive race. Shadowkin excel in stealth and assassination, but their hidden history and distrustful nature make them outsiders in most societies.

keys: humans, adaptable race, versatile survivors, jack of all trades, human ambition
value: Humans are the most adaptable race in Aetheris, capable of excelling in any path they choose. While they lack the innate strengths of other races, their ingenuity and ambition allow them to thrive in even the harshest realities. Whether as warriors, mages, or diplomats, humans are defined by their resilience and determination to carve their own destiny.
title: 🏹 Humans (Versatile Survivors)
description: A balanced race capable of excelling in any role. They gain knowledge and skills faster than others, making them well-suited for leadership and hybrid combat styles.

keys: orcs, warborn, primal warriors, savage strength, berserkers
value: Orcs are fierce and relentless warriors, built for battle and conquest. With raw strength unmatched by any other race, they thrive in war, using brute force and fury to overwhelm their foes. Their blood burns with primal rage, allowing them to endure pain that would break lesser beings. While often seen as savage, orcs value loyalty and honor among their own.
title: 🔥 Orcs (Warborn Berserkers)
description: A physically dominant race built for combat. Orcs excel in melee battles and can tap into their berserker instincts, but their lack of patience and subtlety can be their downfall.

keys: lizardfolk, reptilian warriors, coldblooded survivors, jungle hunters, swamp dwellers
value: Reptilians are resilient and cunning survivors, thriving in the harshest environments. With thick, scaled skin and an affinity for swamps, deserts, and jungles, they are natural hunters and ambush predators. Their reptilian nature grants them adaptability and endurance, but their cold and calculating mindset often makes them difficult to understand.
title: 🦎 Reptilians (Cold-Blooded Hunters)
description: A tough, survivalist race well-adapted to extreme environments. Reptilians excel in stealth and ambush tactics but can struggle to form deep emotional bonds with others.

keys: elves, arcane race, agile spellcasters, mystical beings, elven grace
value: Elves are an ancient race attuned to magic and nature. Their keen senses and grace make them deadly warriors and formidable sorcerers. With an innate connection to the arcane, elves excel at ranged combat and spellcasting, using their agility and wisdom to outmaneuver their foes. While elegant and long-lived, their arrogance often isolates them from other races.
title: 🌿 Elves (Graceful Mystics)
description: A race attuned to magic and agility. Elves excel in spellcasting and ranged combat but can be prideful and distant, shaping their interactions with other races.

keys: hidden ones, architects of the cycle, unseen beings, enforcers of Aetherfall, watchers beyond time
value: The Hidden Ones are ancient, unseen beings who have shaped Aetheris since time immemorial. They exist beyond mortal perception, weaving the threads of reality and ensuring the endless flow of the Aetherfall. Neither gods nor mortals, they are the silent architects of the eternal struggle, erasing those who come too close to the truth. Their influence lingers in whispers, forgotten ruins, and the memories that fade with each Aetherfall. To defy them is to challenge the very nature of existence itself.
title: 👁️ The Hidden Ones (Veiled Architects of Fate)
description: A mysterious and godlike race that operates beyond mortal understanding. The Hidden Ones control the resets of Aetheris, manipulating reality to maintain the eternal cycle. Few have encountered them and survived, and fewer still remember.

keys: celestial order, divine rule, holy empire, golden utopia, radiant ascendancy, divine law
value: The Celestial Order is a holy empire devoted to divine rule. They seek to purge Aetheris of corruption, reshaping reality into a golden utopia of order and purity. Their cities float above the land, bathed in eternal light, where laws are absolute, and justice is swift. Holy magic thrives, but dissent is erased. Are they saviors or tyrants? Only those who defy them will know.
title: 🌟 The Celestial Order (Divine Rulers of Light and Law)
description: A theocratic faction enforcing strict order and faith. Their Aetherfall creates a perfect yet oppressive world, eliminating all chaos and darkness.

keys: legion, war-torn empire, conquest, gladiator pits, survival of the strongest, blood and battle
value: The Crimson Legion believes only the strong deserve to rule. Their world is one of endless war, where conquest is law and weakness is a death sentence. Gladiators fight for dominance, warlords carve empires from the ashes, and duels settle all disputes. In their domain, there is no peace—only victory or defeat.
title: 🔥 The Crimson Legion (Warlords of Endless Conquest)
description: A militaristic faction where conflict is eternal. Their Aetherfall creates a brutal world of conquest, where strength alone determines fate.

keys: arcane consortium, floating islands, unstable, fractured nexus, magic anomaly, reality warping
value: The Arcane Consortium is a collective of scholars and sorcerers who see reality as a puzzle to be rewritten. Their world is unstable—floating islands, shifting time, and raw magic bleeding into existence. Power is limitless, but dangerous. In their realm, nothing is fixed, and only those who embrace chaos can survive.
title: 🌀 The Arcane Consortium (Masters of Unstable Magic and Forbidden Knowledge)
description: A faction of mages and scholars seeking to bend reality itself. Their Aetherfall creates a realm where magic reigns, but stability is an illusion.

keys: shadow pact, eternal veil, illusion magic, deception, hidden city, silent war
value: The Shadow Pact does not rule openly—they manipulate from the darkness. Masters of deception and illusion, they weave a world where truth is a lie, and power is hidden. Their lands are cloaked in twilight, where whispers shape destinies, and trust is a dangerous gamble. To survive, one must become the unseen.
title: 🌑 The Shadow Pact (Architects of Deception and Twilight)
description: A faction of spies, assassins, and illusionists who control from the shadows. Their Aetherfall creates a world of endless twilight and deception.

keys: wildborn clans, verdant rebirth, primal world, nature reclaiming, beast taming, survival in the wild
value: The Wildborn Clans believe civilization is a disease. They seek to return Aetheris to its primal state, where nature rules and the weak are culled. Their reality is untamed—forests reclaim cities, beasts roam free, and survival is the only law. To the Wildborn, strength is found in instinct, not steel.
title: 🌲 The Wildborn Clans (Nomadic Guardians of Nature’s Wrath)
description: A tribal faction that rejects civilization. Their Aetherfall erases cities and empires, leaving only the wild and those strong enough to endure it.

keys: factionless, wanderers, outcasts, mercenaries, free agents, unaligned, neutral forces
value:
Not all who walk Aetheris pledge loyalty to a faction. Some are outcasts, wanderers, or those who refuse to be bound by the ambitions of warlords and zealots. These individuals are known as the Factionless—survivors of a world in flux, forging their own fate beyond the banners of conquest.

The Factionless are neither trusted nor openly opposed, for their allegiances shift like the Aetherfall itself. Some are mercenaries, selling their skills to the highest bidder. Others are scholars, seekers of forbidden knowledge lost between resets. And a few… a few dream of a world where the cycle of power can be broken entirely.

To be Factionless is to walk a lonely, uncertain road, free from the chains of war—but never free from its consequences.
title: ⚖️ The Factionless (Wanderers, Outcasts, and Free Agents)
description: Those who remain Factionless may find opportunity in freedom, but danger in isolation. While they can navigate between factions, their loyalty is always questioned—for one who serves none may be the greatest threat of all.

keys: ethereal realm, beyond the cycle, cosmic war, forgotten ones, the final choice, timeless battle
value: Beyond the Aetherfall lies the Ethereal Realm, a place beyond time where those who have broken the Cycle gather. Here, rulers of past worlds clash, knowledge long erased resurfaces, and cosmic forces stir. The war is not over—it has only shifted to a battlefield beyond reality itself.
title: ✨ The Ethereal Ones (The Hidden Forces Beyond the Aetherfall)
description: A hidden endgame faction for those who put an end to the Aetherfall. In this realm, reality is unshaken—yet something far more ominous lurks beyond.

keys: bloodmarked fields, battlefield, warfront, faction warfare, mercenary lands
value:
The ground is soaked in blood. War has no beginning and no end here. The factions clash in an unrelenting cycle, fighting over the first Crystal Shards that surface after every Aetherfall.

No side holds dominance, no leader controls the battlefield—only the strongest and the most ruthless survive. Mercenaries roam the land, scavenging from the dead. War priests offer blessings to those who would carve their names into legend. And in the chaos, the power of the shards can be seen firsthand—an unstable fragment pulsing with raw energy, bending reality around it.

To be here is to be caught in fate’s grasp. You must fight, flee, or fall.
title: ⚔️ The Bloodmarked Fields
description: An action-focused starting area, throwing players into immediate conflict. Ideal for those who want to choose a faction quickly or discover the true cost of power firsthand.

keys: hollow refuge, lost settlement, neutral zone, forgotten histories, echoes of the past
value:
A forgotten settlement nestled between shifting realities, The Hollow Refuge is one of the few places untouched by the Aetherfall. Built from the ruins of past worlds, its streets whisper with memories that should not exist, and its people remember things they should not know.

Factionless wanderers, rogue scholars, and those who reject the endless war gather here, speaking in hushed tones of the truth behind the resets. Some seek safety, others seek purpose, but all who remain know one thing—the world outside does not remember them, but they remember the world.

A blind seer resides in the Refuge, speaking of echoes of lost Aetherfalls, forgotten gods, and a path beyond fate itself. But beware—some secrets were erased for a reason.
title: 🏚️ The Hollow Refuge
description: A neutral safe zone where players can discover traces of past worlds, meet NPCs with fragmented memories, and gather forbidden knowledge before choosing their path.

keys: dwarves, mountain warriors, stoneborn, master craftsmen, dwarven resilience
value: Dwarves are stout, unyielding warriors forged in the depths of the mountains. Masters of craftsmanship and battle, they are known for their unwavering endurance and skill with heavy weapons. With bodies resistant to physical strain and minds as strong as steel, dwarves stand firm in the face of any challenge. Tradition and honor guide them, but their stubborn nature can be both a strength and a weakness.
title: ⛏️ Dwarves (Stoneborn Warriors)
description: A hardy race with high endurance and craftsmanship. Dwarves are skilled warriors and builders, excelling in heavy armor and melee combat but often resistant to change.

keys: althisa saltborn, sea’s chosen, tidecaller’s disciple, water-bound mystic, voice of the abyss
value:
Althisa does not walk—she drifts, as if guided by unseen currents. Her presence alone is enough to make the air thick with humidity, the scent of brine following wherever she goes.

She is the Saints’ most devoted disciple, a woman who claims to have lived a hundred lives beneath the ocean’s depths. She does not remember land—only the sea.
title: 🌊 Althisa "The Saltborn"
description: A fanatical follower of Father Iskar, she speaks in riddles, her words flowing like waves. Some say she is more water than flesh.

keys: crossroads of fate, neutral gathering, hidden knowledge, travelers, waystone
value:
A nameless waystone stands at the heart of The Crossroads of Fate, pulsing with a faint energy that defies the Aetherfall. The roads leading in all directions twist and shift with every passing season, but the Crossroads itself remains unchanged, untouched by war, untethered from time.

Here, travelers from every faction pass through—soldiers resting before the next battle, exiles seeking a new purpose, merchants peddling strange relics from past worlds. Stories flow like water, and whispers of hidden truths drift on the wind.

It is said that those who linger too long at the Crossroads may find themselves speaking to someone who does not belong to this era… or even this reality.
title: 🌲 The Crossroads of Fate
description: A lore-heavy and exploration-focused starting area, offering glimpses of factions, ancient mysteries, and forbidden secrets before the player makes a major choice.

keys: crimson pact, bloodbound assassins, mercenary brotherhood, lawless killers, blade-bound warriors
value: An underground brotherhood of warlords, assassins, and mercenaries who reject the rule of kings and gods. They believe strength is the only truth, and blood is the only currency worth spending. Their contracts are written in lifeblood, their loyalty measured only by the edge of a blade. Betray them, and you will not live long enough to regret it.
title: 🩸 The Crimson Pact
description: A secretive order of mercenaries and killers who sell their services to the highest bidder. While they operate in the shadows, they are not bound by secrecy—only by the law of strength. Some say they have existed since before the first Aetherfall.

keys: final world, beyond the veil, ethereal realm, forgotten history, cosmic choice, Aetherfall
value: Beyond time, beyond The Aetherfall, lies the Ethereal Realm—a place where reality itself fractures and echoes of past worlds linger. Here, the architects of The Aetherial Veil reside, and the final choice must be made. Will you rule over The Sundering, or break free, forever? The fate of existence hangs in the balance.
title: The Ethereal Realm
description: The endgame reality where the truth is revealed. Players must confront the creators of Aetheris and make the ultimate decision—continue the Aetherfall or destroy it forever.
